titles.title: O Blessed Saviour, Son of God

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Blessed Saviour, Son of God, Who hast redeemed us with Thy blood From guilt, and death, and shame, With joy and praise Thy people see The crown of glory worn by Thee, And worthy Thee proclaim.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Exalted by the Father's love, All thrones, and powers, and names above, At God's right hand in heaven: Wisdom and riches, power divine, Blessing and honour, Lord, are Thine --- All things to Thee are given.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And soon, the day of glory come, Thy bride shall reach her destined home And all Thy beauty see: How great our joy to see Thee shine, To hear Thee own us, Lord, as Thine, And ever dwell with Thee!{/lang-eng}
